mapper.select: SELECT datatype.typeCode,datatypedetail.typeDetailCode,datatypedetail.typeDetailName FROM m_datatype datatype,m_datatypedetail datatypedetail WHERE datatype.typeCode = datatypedetail.typeCode AND datatype.delflag = 0 AND datatypedetail.delflag = 0 AND datatype.typeCode = #{typeCode} ORDER BY datatype.typeCode,datatypedetail.typeDetailCode
SELECT typeDetailName FROM m_datatypedetail WHERE typeCode = #{typeCode} AND typeDetailCode = #{typeDetailCode} AND delflag = 0
